cause.description:
Same old, same old. Bloody boring endless rock and indie retreads.
There is a whole world of interesting non-rock music. Explore.
1. The new thing is not new, nor was it last time
2. Rock and indie pop is a victory of hope over originality
3. DON'T CRY. It'll be all right.
cause.mission: Bury the corpse and move on
cause.name: Rock is dead
